comprehensive_overview: Dsuite is a Python package for processing, analyzing, and visualizing longitudinal and survival data in a user-friendly way. It is designed to facilitate data exploration, estimation of parametric and non-parametric models, and visualization of results for longitudinal and survival data analysis.
core_features: Some of the core features of dsuite include data preprocessing, model estimation for longitudinal and survival analysis, visualization tools for exploring and interpreting results, and integration with other Python libraries for statistical analysis and data visualization.
